{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = NVIDIA Jetson Nano 2GB Developer Kit.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Jetson Nano 2GB Developer Kit |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://developer.nvidia.com/embedded/jetson-nano-2gb-developer-kit |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = NVIDIA_Jetson_Nano_2GB_Developer_Kit |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = nVIDIA |model = Jetson |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Nano 2GB Developer Kit |revision = rev A02 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = development board, single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AUHL-0611 |icid = 22115-0611 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = nVIDIA;TM660M-A2; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A57 |cpu1spd = 1.43 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25U3235F; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT53E256M32D2DS-046 WT:B; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8111HS; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 48:B0:2D |oui = 00:E0:4C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;4.9.201;Ubuntu 18.04;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (Female Micro-B),Micro SD (TF) slot |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB (Type C)
|serial = yes,, via 12-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0, MIPI CSI, UART, GPIO, I2C, I2S, SPI, heatsink, |addchip = 5V 2 Phase Buck Controller;uPI Semi;uP1666Q;;2;,,, 1.2MHz, 3.0A Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi;uP1728S;;1;,,, 8-bit Bidirectional Voltage-Level Translator;TI;TXB0108;3;,,, 4-port USB 2.0 Hub Controller;Terminus Technology;FE8.1;;1;,,, 30V, 32A P-Channel MOSFET;SinoPower;SM3337P;;1;,,, 30V, 75A N-Channel Power MOSFET;ON Semi;NTTFS4C05N;;4;,,, 5.7V, 6A On-Resistance Load Switch;TI;TPS22965;;2;,,, PMIC;Maxim Integrated;MAX77620A;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = set at first login |defaultpass = set at first login |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/31/2020 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 59 |upc = 812674024547 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08J157LHH |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Haoliyuan LINCUKOO |rad1modif = USB 2.0 |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8811CU; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[nVIDIA]]'' Jetson Nano (TM660M-A2) :4x [[ARM]] (Cortex-A57) @1.43GHz *GPU: 128x ''Maxwell'' :4Kp60 HEVC/H.265, H.264 *Storage: 4MB flash, Micro SD (TF) slot *RAM: 2GB (LPDDR4) *USB: 1x USB 3.0 Type-A, 2x USB 2.0 Type-A, :1x Micro USB 2.0 (OTG) *Power Source: 5V/3A via USB Type C
==Links of Interest== *[https://elinux.org/Jetson_Nano ''Jetson Nano Wiki'' on '''eLinux'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/10/06/nvidia-jetson-nano-2gb-developer-kit/ ''NVIDIA Jetson Nano 2GB Developer Kit Launched for $54 and up'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/jetson-nano-2gb-dev-kit-to-launch-for-59/ ''Jetson Nano 2GB dev kit to launch for $59'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:NVIDIA Jetson Nano 2GB Developer Kit.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]] <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:Jetson Nano 2GB Carrier Board Top.jpeg|Carrier Board Top File:Jetson Nano 2GB Carrier Board Bottom.jpeg|Carrier Board Bottom File:Jetson Nano 2GB Module Top.jpeg|Module Top File:Jetson Nano 2GB Module Bottom.jpeg|Module Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
